value.title: Azure Friday | Get Intelligent Insights for Improving Azure SQL Database Performance
value.excerpt: Veljko Vasic shows Seth Juarez how Azure SQL Database uses built-in intelligence to continuously monitors database usage so that it can detect disruptive events that cause poor performance.
